definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :Is 43:6 south, south wind, chiefly poet., P & Ez (lit. what is on the right (hand), i.e. as one faces east; v. Wetzst:Verhandi. d. Berl. Anthrop. Ges. 1878, 390)—abs. ´[[ת]] Zec 9:14 + 6 t. (´[[הַתּ]] only Zec 6:6); [[תֵּמָן]] Job 9:9; c. [[ה]] loc. [[תֵּימָ֫נׇה]] Ex 26:18 + 12 t.;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: south, southern quarter of sky, [[לְתֵימָן]] Job 39:26 (of flight of bird); of constellations ´[[חַדְרֵי ת]] Job 9:9; ´[[סַעֲרוֹת ת]] Zec 9:14 whirlwinds of the south; of territory, the south Is 43:6 (opp. [[חָפוֹן]]), also ´[[אֶרֶץ הַתּ]] Zec 6:6 (opp. [[אֶרֶץ חָפוֹן]]); ´[[נֶגְכָּה מִקְחֵה ת]] Jos 15:1 southward at the end of the south, i.e. in the remotest south (of the land);—see also II. ´[[ת]].

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. [[ה]] loc. toward the south, esp. in topograph. description (oft. with other points of compass), [[פְּאַת בֶ֫גְבָּה תֵּימָ֫נׇה]] Ex 26:18 (P), ´[[נ]] ´[[ת]] ´[[פ]] Ez Eze 47:19, ´[[נֶגֶב ת]] ´[[פ]] Ex 27:9, Ex 36:33, Ex 38:9 (all P), Ez Eze 47:19, Eze 48:28; + [[חלע]] side Ex 26:35, [[ירך]] Nu 3:29 (both P); also Nu 2:10, Nu 10:6 (P); [[וּמִזְרָחָה]] ´[[יָ֫מָּה וְחָםפׂ֫נׇה וְת]] De 3:27; [[ה]] loc. in redundant in [[דֶּרֶח תֵּימָ֫נׇה]] Ez Eze 21:2 turn they face southward (‖[[דָּרוֹם]] and [[נֶגֶב]]).
south wind Ps 78:26 ([[קָדִים]] in ‖ cl.), Ct So 4:16 ([[חָפוֹן]] in ‖ cl.)
